mapper.select: SELECT TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_ID, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_PWD, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_NAME, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_IMG, TEACHERACCOUNT.EMAIL, TEACHERACCOUNT.PHONENUM, TEACHERACCOUNT.USER_TYPE, TEACHERACCOUNT.BELONG, TEACHERACCOUNT.CAREER, TEACHERACCOUNT.WEBSITE, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_DESC, TEACHERACCOUNT.REGISTER_DATE FROM TEACHERACCOUNT
